actions.args: {"id": 23, "body": {"name": "Mentoring at dAGI Brussels (2024-07-05 - 2024-07-07)", "summary": "dAGI Brussels: Summary of work done and travel expenses", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": "yarotska.near", "description": "\\\\n\\\\nSummary of work activities:\\\\n\\\\n- Preparing talk and tech demo\\\\n- Mentoring sessions with hackers/teams to\\\\n  - introduce NEAR advantages/disadvantages\\\\n  - ideate\\\\n  - help with NEAR-related implementations\\\\n- Judging projects\\\\n\\\\nTravel expenses:\\\\n- Flights: 210.62 EUR\\\\n- Transport to/from airport: 51.29 EUR\\\\n- Accomodation: 322.50 EUR\\\\n- Food: 93.5 EUR\\\\n\\\\nTotal travel costs: 677.91 EUR = 742.10 USD (Yahoo exchange rate 2024-07-17)\\\\n\\\\nHours worked:\\\\n- Fri 2024-07-05: 4 hours\\\\n- Sat 2024-07-06: 8 hours\\\\n- Sun 2024-07-07: 8 hours\\\\n\\\\nTotal hours worked: 20\\\\nHourly rate: 50 USD\\\\nTotal work cost: 1000 USD\\\\n\\\\n1742.10 USD", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "tifrel_hacks.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "1742", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": ["Hackathon", "Travel expenses"]}

{"id": 22, "body": {"name": "Event participation: strategy and meetings", "summary": "Participation on the biggest event this year here in Brazil: Blockchain RIo\\\\n\\\\nThe goal is to connect and to meet some partners to discuss a proposal that Im going to bring here to DevHub: Educate more developers and partner with projects to teach Rust and develop on Near\\\\n\\\\nTo this event I have the ticket and Im requesting cover the travel expenses\\\\n\\\\nSome people dont know me but I work with Near Brazil since 2022 building our Regional Community\\\\n\\\\nFlight $500\\\\nHotel $150\\\\nFood $150\\\\nTotal: $800\\\\n", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "REJECTED", "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "supervisor": "yarotska.near", "description": "Participation in Blockchain Rio to Expand Near Developer Ecosystem\\\\nhttps://blockchainrio.com.br/\\\\n\\\\nObjective:\\\\n\\\\nStrengthen Near position as a leading blockchain ecosystem in the country.\\\\nFor several months I have worked with Anderson to build a regional community and helping people onboard on Near. Now its time to move on to next step and help bring more developers to Near.\\\\n\\\\nThe goal is to identify and partner with projects aligned with Near\\\\\\'s mission to educate developers and build on the chain. I already have some names and Im going to meet with them and refine the idea.\\\\n\\\\nStrategy:\\\\n\\\\nBy attending Blockchain Rio, the largest blockchain event in Brazil, I aim to:\\\\n\\\\nNetwork and Build Relationships: Connect with key influencers, developers, and projects within the Brazilian blockchain landscape.\\\\nIdentify Potential Partners: Seek out projects and organizations interested in collaborating on developer education and Near-based initiatives.\\\\nGather Market Insights: Understand the latest trends, challenges, and opportunities in the Brazilian blockchain market.\\\\n\\\\nExpected Outcomes:\\\\n\\\\nEstablish partnerships with local projects for Near developer education programs.\\\\nIncrease Near\\\\\\'s brand visibility and community engagement in Brazil.\\\\nIdentify potential collaborators for joint development initiatives.\\\\nContribute to the growth of the Near ecosystem in the country.\\\\n\\\\nInvestment:\\\\n\\\\nThe proposed investment covers travel expenses to attend Blockchain Rio. As an OG and dedicated member of the Near Brazil team since 2022, I have a proven track record of building and growing the regional community\\\\n", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "vianftbrasil.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "800", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": ["Travel expenses"]}

{"body": {"name": "Mentoring at ETHGlobal Brussels (2024-07-12 - 2024-07-14)", "summary": "ETHGlobal Brussels: Summary of work done and travel expenses", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": null, "description": "**Summary of work activities**\\\\n* Mentoring sessions with hackers/teams to\\\\n\\\\t* introduce NEAR advantages/disadvantages\\\\n\\\\t* ideate\\\\n\\\\t* help with NEAR-related implementations\\\\n* Judging projects\\\\n\\\\n-------\\\\n\\\\n**Travel expenses**\\\\nFlights: 551.24 EUR\\\\nTransport to/from airport: 95.62 EUR\\\\nAccomodation: 474.72 EUR\\\\nFood: 0 EUR\\\\nTotal travel costs: 1121.58 EUR = 1226.85 USD (exchange rate 2024-07-17)\\\\n\\\\n---------\\\\n\\\\n**Hours worked**\\\\nFri 2024-07-12: 13 hours\\\\nSat 2024-07-13: 13 hours\\\\nSun 2024-07-14: 6 hours\\\\n\\\\nTotal hours worked: 32\\\\nHourly rate: 50 USD\\\\nTotal work cost: 1600 USD\\\\n\\\\n-------\\\\n\\\\n**Total**\\\\n2827 USD", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "denbite.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "2827", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": ["Hackathon", "Travel expenses"]}

{"body": {"name": "Contributor Report - Jose Couto -  April 1st 2024 to July 14th 2024", "summary": "Contributor report from April 1st to July 14th, working on planning, supporting and excecuting several IRL events, communications, socials and strategies.", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": "yarotska.near", "description": "Month: April\\\\nWeeks:\\\\n04/01/24 - 04/14/24 40 Hours\\\\n04/15/24 - 04/26/24 36 Hours\\\\n\\\\nWork report:\\\\nPreproduction for ETH Brew and ETH Dam\\\\nCoordinate local contributor for ETHBrew and ETHBerlin\\\\nZK case study. Wistlebloweing tool for EU - Briefing and presentation\\\\nSocials\\\\nMarketing planning\\\\n\\\\nMonth: May\\\\nWeeks:\\\\n04/29/24 - 05/10/24 36 Hours\\\\n05/13/24 - 05/26/24 40 Hours\\\\n05/27/24 - 05/31/24 8 Hours\\\\n\\\\nWork report:\\\\nETBBrew Pre Production\\\\nETHCC and ETHGlobal Brussels planning\\\\nSide events and Partnership scouting with Encode and external producers\\\\nETHGlobal Brussels planning - Themed branding research and planning\\\\nChA comic Pre Production\\\\nDevHub Goals and KPIs working sessions\\\\nSocials\\\\n\\\\nMonth: June\\\\nWeeks:\\\\n06/03/24 - 06/14/24 40 Hours\\\\n06/17/24 - 06/28/24 32 Hours\\\\n\\\\nWork report:\\\\nETHGlobal Brussels Swag preproduction and production\\\\nETHCC Hacker House planning and pre production\\\\nETHGlobal Brussels hackathon planning\\\\nEvents Q3 & Q4 planning\\\\nDevHub Goals and KPIs working sessions\\\\nChA Comic production\\\\n\\\\nMonth: July\\\\nWeeks:\\\\n07/01/24 - 07/14/24 80 Hours\\\\n\\\\nWork report:\\\\nETHGlobal Brussels pre production and production\\\\nETHGlobal Blussels hackathon mentoring and logistics\\\\nHacker House managing and mentoring\\\\nSocials\\\\n\\\\nTotal Weeks: 15\\\\nTotal hours: 312\\\\nHourly rate: $ 50\\\\nTotal Contributor work: $ 15,600\\\\n\\\\nTravel expenses: $ 945.23\\\\nETH Dam T-shirts production $474\\\\nSwag production surplus ($ 751.76)\\\\n\\\\nTotal travel expenses and swag reimbursement: $ 667.47\\\\n\\\\nTotal Contributor work plus expenses: $15,793.47\\\\n", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "josecouto.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "15793", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": ["Travel expenses", "Other"]}

{"body": {"name": "DevHub event participation (design)", "summary": "DevHub event participation strategy, design and support (May 15 - June 30, 2024)", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "REVIEW", "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "supervisor": "orangejoe.near", "description": "EthCC/Hackerhouse: \\\\n- EthCC comic creation, supervision and development with external subcontractors\\\\n- brand treatment R&D\\\\n- brand treatment deliverables: prints, social media assets, collateral\\\\n(comic, amenity kit prints, t-shirt prints, engraving design, pins and stickers, sunglasses)\\\\n- art-direction, calls\\\\n- rollup banner design (evergreen)\\\\n- event background design (evergreen)\\\\n\\\\n**Total hours: 80 hours\\\\nHourly rate: $55\\\\nService fee: $4400**", "linked_proposals": [7], "receiver_account": "sashapais.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "4400", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDT"}, "labels": ["Other", "Event sponsorship"]}
